column5: Fyi this is a good deal and they work well
bought that kit 6 years ago and rewired my trailer the same day, never had to replace a light or broken wire so far!  jjcanoe
You got lucky JJ. My father, my fathers friend and my uncle have each had to take them back to get replaced and then take them back again and find a good set haha,
No problems with mine either... 3yrs and counting.
